item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 29, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. President Jimmy Carter has passed away (341 points | 101 comments)
2. Are PC hardware companies driving technology into restricted closed ecosystems? (117 points | 73 comments)
3. Is Iceland getting ready to join the EU? (89 points | 151 comments)
4. 20 Years Ago Today, Deadliest Tsunami Set Off Work to Be Ready for Next Big Wave (17 points | 3 comments)
5. Apple Photos phones home on iOS 18 and macOS 15 (1104 points | 835 comments)
6. WebGL Fluid Simulation (319 points | 39 comments)
7. I Run LLMs Locally (149 points | 87 comments)
8. BioTerrorism Will Save Your Life with the 4 Thieves Vinegar Collective [video] (121 points | 106 comments)
9. Build a working game of Tetris in Conway's Game of Life (2014) (146 points | 14 comments)
10. Toronto man creates tiny mobile homes to help unhoused people escape the cold (140 points | 107 comments)
11. BSD kqueue is a mountain of technical debt (2021) (102 points | 67 comments)
12. Intel's $475M error: the silicon behind the Pentium division bug (327 points | 96 comments)
13. Racket-embed-images-in-source-text (37 points | 6 comments)
14. Melbourne Train Control System is running on a hardware emulated PDP11 (65 points | 11 comments)
15. Breaking NATO Radio Encryption [video] (38 points | 6 comments)
16. Where can you go in Europe by train in 8h? (589 points | 383 comments)
17. 38C3: Illegal Instructions (403 points | 60 comments)
18. I automated my job application process (548 points | 758 comments)
19. Using AZs can eat up your budget – From Prometheus to VictoriaMetrics (61 points | 37 comments)
20. Show HN: Kando – A cross-platform pie menu for your desktop (69 points | 27 comments)
21. We've not been trained for this: life after the Newag DRM disclosure [video] (327 points | 54 comments)
22. Trying to use Bluesky without getting burned again (76 points | 132 comments)
23. Board game from Mexican prisons brings together people from all walks of life (20 points | 2 comments)
24. The last Inca bridge master (6 points | discuss)
25. Can LLMs accurately recall the Bible? (102 points | 59 comments)
26. I was wrong about the ethics crisis (186 points | 235 comments)
27. EmacsConf 2024 Notes (322 points | 119 comments)
28. The average American spent 2.5 months on their phone in 2024 (137 points | 164 comments)
29. Libsearch: Simple index-free full-text search for JavaScript (72 points | 14 comments)
30. 38C3: Blinkencity, radio controlling street lamps and power plants [video] (182 points | 39 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 29, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
